newsitem.title: GERMANY: Germany allots 8.519 bln marks series 122 bobl.
newsitem.headline: Germany allots 8.519 bln marks series 122 bobl.

text.p: The German federal government sold 8.519 billion marks of its series 122 five-year Bundesobligation, or Bobl, at a price of 99.46 and above, the Bundesbank as issuing agent said on Wednesday.
The Bundesbank retained 1.729 billion marks for its open market operations.
The average yield was 4.61 percent and the average weighted price was 99.49.
The series 122 five-year notes mature on February 22, 2002.
The total volume of the issue was 13 billion marks.
